thread.title: The Weeknd, U2, Chance The Rapper, Red Hot Chili Peppers to Headline Bonnaroo 2017
thread.title_full: The Weeknd, U2, Chance The Rapper, Red Hot Chili Peppers to Headline Bonnaroo 2017

author: Hypebeast (info@hypebeast.com)
title: The Weeknd, U2, Chance The Rapper, Red Hot Chili Peppers to Headline Bonnaroo 2017
text:
The lineup for the 2017 installment of the annual Bonnaroo Music & Arts Festival has officially been announced. As usual, they're bringing out some of the biggest stars in music and this year they certainly didn't hold back. The event will be headlined by The Weeknd, U2, Chance The Rapper and the Red Hot Chili Peppers. In addition, the four-day festival will also include performances from Travis Scott, The xx, BADBADNOTGOOD, The Flatbush Zombies and many more. It all goes down June 8-11 in Manchester, TN. Check out the full lineup below, while ticketing info can be found here .

Click here to view full gallery at Hypebeast.com
